Reviews.Title: just installed - so far so good, doing what it's supposed to

Reviews.Content: price was right, easy to install, white color great for outdoor usejust installed - so far so good, doing what it's supposed to

Reviews.Title: Works well...
Reviews.Author: Max Logan "Stuart"
Reviews.Content: Works as specified and you would not go wrong to buy this item for your security system. I would buy it again.

Video and Power Cable for Lorex CCTV Security Cameras
100 Feet Video & Power Cable in White Color
CCTV cable with BNC Plugs
Pre-Made BNC Video - Power(2.1mm) Cable
Indoor and Outdoor use
